channel.title: Useful Links on Aiden Arnkels-Webb
channel.description: Recent content in Useful Links on Aiden Arnkels-Webb

item.title: Useful Tools for SysAdmins and Techies
item.description: I occurs to me that each time I set up a new system, or re-install my workstation, I often end up hunting down and redownloading tools and software that I use on a regular basis. So I thought I’d create a list of useful tools and pop it here on my blog for future reference and to share with others. I’ll try to keep this list updated as I find new tools and software that I find useful.

item.title: How to get FREE eBooks - All the Kindle Store free eBooks on one link
item.description: There are currently over 50,000 free books to choose from on Amazon’s Kindle Store. Just add a book to your library using the Buy now button (not Subscribe to Kindle Unlimited / Read for Â£0.00) and read with Amazon Cloud reader in a web browser or sync to your Kindle. The below link will open a filtered search on the Amazon UK website showing ALL the books that are currently FREE to add to your account without needing a Kindle unlimited subscription.
